info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 04 at 4:29PM PDT until September 04 at 4:45PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM PDT FOR NORTHEASTERN VENTURA AND NORTHWESTERN LOS ANGELES COUNTIES... At 428 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles west of Lake Hughes, or 17 miles northwest of Santa Clarita, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Automated weather stations. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pyramid Lake... and Interstate 5 over the Grapevine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
